message.entry: Invalid data type. Arguments must be double or single matrices.
Tolerance must be a nonnegative scalar number of type double or single.
Input matrices must be 2-dimensional. Use PAGELSQMINNORM to calculate the least squares solution of each page of an N-D array.
Invalid name-value arguments. 'RegularizationFactor' must be followed by a corresponding value.
Regularization factor must be nonnegative scalar.
